# AXDataPoint.Value

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe types of data values.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Value
```

## Constants

- **AXDataPoint.Value.category(_:)**: A categorical data value.
- **AXDataPoint.Value.number(_:)**: A numeric data value.

## Specifying the data value

- **xValue**: The value of the x-axis for the data point.
- **yValue**: The value of the y-axis for the data point.
- **AXDataPointValue**: A single data value.

items.description: The value of the x-axis for the data point.
items.name: xValue

items.description: The value of the y-axis for the data point.
items.name: yValue
